Class Date

java.lang.Object
Objects.Date
public class Date extends Object
The Date class represents a specific day of a month in a property's availability calendar. It stores the day number, a base price, an environmental impact rate, and the reservation status.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Date(int day)
    Constructs a Date object with a specific day.

  • Constructor Details

    • Date

      public Date(int day)
      Constructs a Date object with a specific day. The date is initially available (not reserved). The base price is set to 1500.0 by default. The environmental impact rate is set to 1.0 (100%).
      Parameters:
      day - the day of the month (1â€“30)

  • Method Details

    • getDay

      public int getDay()
      Retrieves the day number of this date.
      Returns:
      the day of the month

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice()
      Retrieves the base price assigned to this date. This is the price before applying modifiers.
      Returns:
      the base price per night

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice(double price)
      Updates the base price for this date only if it is at least 100.
      Parameters:
      price - the new base price to set

    • getEnvironmentalRate

      public double getEnvironmentalRate()
      Retrieves the environmental impact rate for this date. This value ranges from 0.80 to 1.20.
      Returns:
      the environmental impact rate

    • setEnvironmentalRate

      public void setEnvironmentalRate(double rate)
      Sets the environmental impact rate if within the allowed range of 0.80 to 1.20.
      Parameters:
      rate - the environmental rate to set

    • getFinalPrice

      public double getFinalPrice(double typeMultiplier)
      Computes the final nightly price for this date. The formula is: final price = base price * type multiplier * environmental rate
      Parameters:
      typeMultiplier - the multiplier based on property type
      Returns:
      the computed final nightly price

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable()
      Checks whether this date is available for reservation.
      Returns:
      true if the date is not reserved; false otherwise

    • book

      public void book()
      Marks this date as reserved.

    • unbook

      public void unbook()
      Marks this date as available (not reserved).

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a formatted string containing the day, base price, and reservation status.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string with date information
